oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: The Eddy Arnold Show - #002
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The Eddy Arnold Show #2, produced and transcribed in Nashville, TN. by Brown Radio Productions. Featuring Eddy Arnold and the Tennessee Plowboys, the Willis Brothers, Roy Wiggins, and host 'Pappy' Hal Horton. Opening theme music, 'Cattle Call'; closing theme music, 'Boil Them Cabbage Down'.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Eddy Arnold; Tennessee Plowboys; Willis Brothers
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening statement (Hal Horton) -- Opening theme -- Opening statement (Eddy Arnold) -- I'll Step Aside (Eddy Arnold) -- Eddy Arnold talks -- No One Will Ever Know (Eddy Arnold) -- Hal Horton and Eddy Arnold introduce the Willis Brothers -- Baby Girl (Willis Brothers) -- Eddy Arnold talks -- Soldier's Joy (Skeeter Willis fiddle) -- Hal Horton and Eddy Arnold talk -- M-O-T-H-E-R (A Word That Means The World To Me) (Eddy Arnold) -- Closing statement (Eddy Arnold) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Hal Horton)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Eddy Arnold Show (Radio program); Horton, Hal, -1948; Arnold, Eddy, 1918-2008; Tennessee Plowboys; Wiggins, Roy; Willis Brothers; Willis, Skeeter, -1976
